file_content.text: This "Tayvor Slen"--is he another Knight of Zakuul?
Who's the administrator?
Nah. Piece of work, but no powers. I plan to shoot him in the head.
I'm in. I could use a blueprint of the Spire, and we always made a good team.
Glad to work together again.
It's just until the job is done.
Just so we're clear: I think you're lying about something, even if I'm not sure what.
I don't trust you.
Feeling's mutual.
Keep an eye out for Skytroopers. I've got to wire a jury-rigged ion grenade into the power junction. I mess up, we all fry.
That blackout you caused shows the whole system's vulnerable. You know about the Overwatch?
Some sort of command center?
Smart girl.
Smart boy.
Overwatch is where they run half the droids in the Spire. Skytroopers, building crews, med units, you name it.
We blow a couple junctions at once, Overwatch security goes down. Force fields, scanners... no power. We walk right in.
This whole city runs on machines. If we interfere with the Overwatch controls, the Spire will practically shut down.
Yeah. These people... the droids do everything for them. Most of the locals sit around drooling while their tech feeds and protects them.
We're going to show them real life for a day or two. No droids. Just until it's fixed.
The plan might work, but what's the goal? If the damage gets repaired, all we're doing is causing chaos.
For what purpose?
We might be able to do more. What about reprogramming the droids from Overwatch command?
Could we control the droids?
I wasn't planning on spending long in there, and tech isn't my thing.
You're playing into Arcann's hands. An attack like that will only unite Zakuul further.
Your plan will backfire.
Look, you came to me. You don't like my methods, I don't really care--but I'll throw in a bonus.
Tayvor Slen, the Overwatch administrator? The data he needs to run those droids is pretty much a blueprint for the city.
You ever plan an attack here, you'll need that data--defenses, vulnerabilities, everything. So we get inside, we both get something good.
A blueprint of the Spire would be worth the effort. Let's keep moving.
Agreed.
Come on... we better get to the next junction before the Skytroopers show.
